remarks: Distributive law for inner product subtraction.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2015.)
statement:
phlsrng.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
phllmhm.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
phllmhm.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
ipsubdir.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` W ) $.
ipsubdir.s $e |- S = ( -g ` F ) $.
ip2subdi.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` F ) $.
ip2subdi.1 $e |- ( ph -> W e. PreHil ) $.
ip2subdi.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
ip2subdi.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. V ) $.
ip2subdi.4 $e |- ( ph -> C e. V ) $.
ip2subdi.5 $e |- ( ph -> D e. V ) $.
ip2subdi $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A .- B ) ., ( C .- D ) ) = ( ( ( A ., C ) .+ ( B ., D ) ) S ( ( A ., D ) .+ ( B ., C ) ) ) ) $.
